name: Ghoul Hunter
description:
Ghoul Hunter is an action adventure game set in the land  of Ozara riddled by ghouls.

From the myths of the arabic tales, ghouls- the evil souls aroused from the graves, came out alive and lurk on the land of ozara threatening the ozarians away. Powered by the dark magic they remain undefeated. But the ozarians are blessed by Luna-A girl raised by a family of magicians and witches who possess an extraordinary power- the power of fire ,spelled from pure magic. As she has finally stepped on the land of ozara, the ghouls are afraid yet cautious. They have hidden themselves in deep forest. But Luna is determined to hunt them all. Luring them by feeding bloodoons, she is all set to capture the blood thirst evils.

 

Help luna use her magic to defeat the evil and save the land of Ozara which has now been invaded by  the  ghouls

 

 Are you all set  to Join her in her journey  of thrill, fear and adventure. Let's go ghoulingg..

 Features-

-Hunt down the ghouls and set them ablaze with Luna's magical fire.

 -Unlock exciting new levels, each one more thrilling and  dangerous from the last.

 -Earn coins amid hunting the notorious ghouls.

 - Play offline - no internet connection necessary!
